snippet: To allow campaigning for a presidential election to be held in July, Mali has lifted the state of emergency that was imposed in January.
abstract: State of emergency in Mali, which has barred gatherings of more than 50 people since January, is lifted to allow campaigning for a presidential election.
lead_paragraph: To allow campaigning for a presidential election to be held in July, Mali has lifted the state of emergency that was imposed in January.

headline.main: Mali Lifts State of Emergency for Election
headline.print_headline: Mali Lifts State of Emergency for Election
